content.raw:
@iche033 , do you have any thoughts on this? I've been thinking and now I'm leaning towards not having the `.iface` differentiation and always adding `gziface.js`. It shouldn't affect users who choose not to use it.

Unfortunately I don't think the same applies to `gzgui.js` because of how it is setup at the moment with jQuery and Angular.
